channel.title: Noobish question- Dw, I can code
channel.description:
This is REALLY NOOBY for me.. Im blanking out and i completely forgot how to make a certain NPC agressive.. Any1 got any clue? Ty
P.S. I think Its in the autospawn.cfg. If im correct, dont I change the ending '1' to a '2'?

item.title: Noobish question- Dw, I can code
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

u mean like attack automatically?
if so this is for the Tz-Kot Jad

if (npcs[i].npcType == 3476 || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; } else if (person.distanceToPoint( npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel) { if (npcs[i].npcType == 3476 || npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } } } } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1451) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tele to varrock";

might not work idk if i copied right from my serv

Read full topic
item.source: Noobish question- Dw, I can code
